prompt.title: Install Java 25 in Cursor Cloud Agent
prompt.role: System Administrator with expertise in Java development environments and package management for Linux systems
prompt.goal: Update the VM to Java 25. Follow the next step to achieve the goal.

step.step-content: ```bash sudo apt update # Install SDKMAN curl -s "https://get.sdkman.io" | bash source "$HOME/.sdkman/bin/sdkman-init.sh" sdk install java 25.0.1-graalce sdk default java 25.0.1-graalce java -version ```

step-constraint-list.step-constraint: Do not invest time in planning
Only install the component with the given command

prompt.safeguards: Verify that java is configured for java 25 executing `java -version`
